repos_data.description: An elegant option/argument parser for shell scripts (full support for bash and all POSIX shells)
Color, ASCII-only Git prompt for zsh, bash, ksh93, mksh, pdksh, oksh, dash, yash, busybox ash, and osh
Simple, fast, nice looking and colorful prompt for busybox/(d)ash/ksh/bash/zsh with Git branch, optional Git status indicator and exit status. Much faster than other Git prompts on MSYS2/Cygwin/WSL.
